title: Keychron K8 Microphone Button to Webex Mute

to.shell_command: if [ $(ps aux | grep -v grep | grep -ci "Meeting Center.app/Contents/Helpers/webexmta.app/Contents/MacOS/webexmta") -gt 0 ]; then osascript -e 'activate application id "com.webex.meetingmanager"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {command down, shift down}'; fi

rules.description: Change Fn + Spacebar to Shift + Cmd + M
